author: Simon Difford
description: "Elder" (elderflower) adds a subtle floral note to bourbon in this riff on a classic Old Fashioned.
name: Elder Fashioned
recipeIngredient: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
